modShortDescription: This simple 7DTD mod the Duct Tape Flashlight Hat allows the player to use a flashlight and a bit of duct tape to craft a simple light for their head.
modDescription:
This simple 7DTD mod the Duct Tape Flashlight Hat allows the player to use a flashlight and a bit of duct tape to craft a simple light for their head. You don’t need a [helmet](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-helmet-mods/) or anything. Just one flashlight and duct tape. It’s that simple.

This is an easy thing to do IRL so Adreden has to add it to the 7 Days to Die.

A video by Adreden for his mod:

[**Download**](https://gitlab.com/adredengaming/adreden_modlets/-/archive/master/adreden_modlets-master.zip?path=Adredens_DuctTapeFlashlightHat)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16328-adredens-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Adreden Gaming](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/adreden-gaming/)
